contentrichtext.text: {{Expand Chinese|date=December 2008|旬邑县}} {{Infobox settlement |name = Xunyi County |translit_lang1 = [[Chinese language|Chinese]] |translit_lang1_info2 = Xúnyì Xiàn |translit_lang1_type = [[Traditional Chinese character|Traditional]] |translit_lang1_info = 旬邑縣 |translit_lang1_type1 = [[Simplified Chinese character|Simplified]] |translit_lang1_info1 = 旬邑县 |translit_lang1_type2 = [[Pinyin]] |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_map_caption = Location in the People's Republic of China |pushpin_mapsize = 300 |settlement_type = [[County (People's Republic of China)|County]] |image_skyline = |image_map = |map_caption = Location of the county |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|China}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of China|Province]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Shaanxi]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Prefecture-level city|Prefecture]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Xianyang]] |unit_pref = Imperial |area_total_km2 = |population = |population_as_of = |population_blank1_title = Ethnicities |population_density_km2 = auto |latNS = N |latd = |latm = |lats = |longEW = E |longd = |longm = |longs = |elevation_ft = |elevation_m = |timezone = [[China standard time]] |utc_offset = +8 |website = }} '''Xunyi County''' is a county of [[Xianyang]], [[Shaanxi]], [[China]]. ==Transportation== *[[China National Highway 211]] {{County-level divisions of Shaanxi}} {{coord|35|08|07|N|108|24|58|E|region:CN-61_type:adm2nd_source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Shaanxi]] [[Category:Xianyang]] {{Shaanxi-geo-stub}}
